briefdescription.para: value of xbee_millisecond_timer() when it's time to restart
Limit values of startup_control based on firmware type (e.g., some firmwares can't be ZCL_COMM_STARTUP_COORDINATOR).

internal.para:
attribute
should be a pointer to zcl_comm_startup_attributes.startup_control
rec
value from write request
See zcl_attribute_write_fn() for calling convention.

briefdescription.para: Send response to a Commissioning Server Cluster request.
Common function used by zcl_comm_restart_device and zcl_comm_reset_parameters.

internal.para: Fills in frame_control and sequence of header. Fills in cluster_id and payload of envelope. Fills in source_endpoint and profile_id of envelope if necessary.
Caller needs to fill in envelope->length and header->command

briefdescription.para: Common function used by zcl_comm_restart_device and zcl_comm_reset_parameters.

internal.para: sends the envelope and then resets the payload and length before returning

briefdescription.para: Send a "Restart Device" command to the ZCL Commissioning Cluster.

detaileddescription.para:
envelope
Partial envelope used to send the request. Caller must set dev, ieee_address, network_address, profile_id, source_endpoint, dest_endpoint and (optionally) options. On return, payload and length are cleared, and cluster_id is set to ZCL_CLUST_COMMISSIONING.
If source_endpoint is 0, function will search the endpoint table for a Commissioning Client Cluster and set the envelope's source_endpoint and profile_id.

parameterdescription.para: Parameters for the Restart Device command or NULL for default settings (save changes and restart without delay/jitter).
couldn't find source endpoint in endpoint table, or some other error in parameter passed to function

briefdescription.para: Send a "Reset Startup Parameters" command to the ZCL Commissioning Cluster.

detaileddescription.para:
envelope
Partial envelope used to send the request. Caller must set dev, ieee_address, network_address, profile_id, source_endpoint, dest_endpoint and (optionally) options. On return, payload and length are cleared, and cluster_id is set to ZCL_CLUST_COMMISSIONING.
If source_endpoint is 0, function will search the endpoint table for a Commissioning Client Cluster and set the envelope's source_endpoint and profile_id.

parameterdescription.para: Parameters for the Reset Startup Parameters command or NULL for default settings (reset current parameters only).
couldn't find source endpoint in endpoint table, or some other error in parameter passed to function

briefdescription.para: Partial implementation of a function to validate a Startup Attribute Set before trying to use it.

parameterdescription.para: Startup Attribute Set is invalid and cannot be used

xrefdescription.para: add more tests to this function

briefdescription.para: Perform a locally-triggered factory reset to default SAS.
if radio successfully joins a network, commit changes to NVRAM

this device can be a coordinator
this device can be a router
this device can be a end device
reset to factory SAS at the delayed restart
install the current SAS at the delayed restart
